lead_paragraph: Furniture Row Racing has withdrawn its appeal of a penalty for illegal roof flaps. Crew chief Cole Pearn will serve his one-race suspension this weekend at Phoenix International Raceway.

headline.main: Furniture Row Racing Drops Appeal of Crew Chief Suspension
headline.print_headline: Furniture Row Racing Drops Appeal of Crew Chief Suspension

snippet: Furniture Row Racing has withdrawn its appeal of a penalty for illegal roof flaps. Crew chief Cole Pearn will serve his one-race suspension this weekend at Phoenix International Raceway.
